lab.title: Optimal Machine Learning Lab
lab.description:
⚡Work on my FYP Gait Recognition System.
⚡Goal is to make hybrid model for gait recognition
⚡Hybrid Model for Authentification and Recognition purposes
 ⚡Working on3D Convolution Neural Networks and LSTMs.

lab.title: CSN - ML Lab
lab.description:
⚡ Collaborate with master's students under Dr. Rehan Ahmed and Dr. Rizwan Ahmed.
⚡ Contribute to machine learning and deep learning projects focused on UAVs Landslide Imaging.
⚡ Tasks include data augmentation, data labeling, and optimizing ML models.
⚡ Work towards enhancing machine learning techniques for UAVs Landslide Imaging applications.

lab.title: IC Design Lab
lab.description:
⚡Connect TFT display via GPIO and communication (SPI/parallel RGB).
⚡Initialize LTDC peripheral for display with resolution and format.
⚡Use graphics libraries for display drawing.
 ⚡Integrate RFID (RF522) via SPI for card reading and link to display updates.
